tldr: The `opentelemetry-jaeger` crate is deprecated and no longer actively maintained. The Jaeger propagator implementation has been migrated to `opentelemetry-jaeger-propagator`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `opentelemetry-jaeger` package from your application. Please take a look at `opentelemetry-jaeger-propagator` instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
